text: "Ride the Night Away" is a 1986 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and is the third and final single from his second studio album For the Working Class Man. It went to number 39 in the Australia. ==Track listing== 7" Single (K 9931) *Side A "Ride the Night Away" - 4:20 *Side B "Paradise" (Remixed Version) - 3:04 Category:1986 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Ride the Night Away
